INSERT INTO Feature ( feat_no, feat_id, feat_title, feat_cont, pre_st_dt, pre_end_dt, st_dt, end_dt, stat_cd, pri_cd, prg, diff_cd, class_cd, use_yn, sys_no, mem_no, tm_no, prj_no ) VALUES ( #{featNo}, #{featId}, #{featTitle}, #{featDescription}, #{preStartDateStr}, NULL, #{preEndDateStr}, NULL, #{startDateStr}, NULL, #{endDateStr}, NULL, #{statusCode}, #{priorCode}, #{progress}, #{diffCode}, NULL, #{classCode}, NULL, 'Y', #{systemNo}, NULL, #{memberNo}, NULL, #{teamNo}, NULL, #{prjNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(feat_no) AS total, COUNT(CASE WHEN prg = 100 THEN 1 END) AS complete, COUNT(CASE WHEN prg < 100 AND SYSDATE < pre_end_dt THEN 1 END) AS presentCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN prg < 100 AND SYSDATE > pre_end_dt THEN 1 END) AS delay, ROUND(AVG(prg), 2) AS progress FROM FEATURE WHERE prj_no = #{prjNo}

SELECT f.feat_no as featNo, f.feat_id as featId, f.feat_title as featTitle, f.feat_cont as featDescription, f.pre_st_dt as preStartDate, f.pre_end_dt as preEndDate, f.st_dt as startDate, f.end_dt as endDate, f.stat_cd as statusCode, f.pri_cd as priorCode, f.prg as progress, f.diff_cd as diffCode, f.class_cd as classCode, f.sys_no as systemNo, f.mem_no as memberNo, f.tm_no as teamNo, f.prj_no as prjNo, s.sys_ttl as systemTitle, m.mem_nm as memberName, stat.cd_dtl_nm AS status, pri.cd_dtl_nm AS priority, diff.cd_dtl_nm AS difficulty, class.cd_dtl_nm AS className FROM feature f, system s, member m, codedetail stat, codedetail pri, codedetail diff, codedetail class WHERE f.sys_no = s.sys_no AND f.mem_no = m.mem_no(+) AND f.stat_cd = stat.cd_dtl_no AND f.pri_cd = pri.cd_dtl_no AND f.diff_cd = diff.cd_dtl_no AND f.class_cd = class.cd_dtl_no AND f.feat_no = #{featNo}
